# In large version, close this side panel.
	
	system.perspective.closeDock('vavDetailsERH')

# On mobile, close this side panel.
	
	system.perspective.closeDock('vavDetailsERH')

transforms.code:
# Return the name of the VAV from the path.
	
	parts = value.split('/')
	return parts[len(parts)-1]

props.path: Building Automation Demo/Page/Floor Plans/Framework/VAV Details Comps/VAV ERH

transforms.code:
# Query data for this zone's ERH count using the 'Last Time' settings
	# configured by the user. Then, put the data in a format that the chart
	# expects (based on the chart configuration set on this view).
	
	seconds = value['timeSelection']
	vav = value['vav']
	
	path1 = '[default]' + vav + '/Heat_Stage1'
	path2 = '[default]' + vav + '/Heat_Stage2'
	endTime = system.date.now()
	startTime = system.date.addSeconds(endTime,(0-seconds))
	history = system.tag.queryTagHistory(paths=[path1,path2],startDate=startTime,endDate=endTime,aggregationMode='LastValue',returnSize=300,noInterpolation=0)
	
	data = []
	for x in range(0,history.getRowCount()):
		data.append({'time':system.date.toMillis(history.getValueAt(x,0)),'erhCount':history.getValueAt(x,1) + history.getValueAt(x,2)})
	
	return data

# Query data for Temp Zone and Flow Discharge using the 'Last Time' settings
	# configured by the user. Then, put the data in a format that the chart
	# expects (based on the chart configuration set on this view).
	
	seconds = value['timeSelection']
	vav = value['vav']
	
	pathTempZone = '[default]' + vav + '/Temp_Zone'
	pathFlowDischarge = '[default]' + vav + '/Flow_Duct1'
	endTime = system.date.now()
	startTime = system.date.addSeconds(endTime,(0-seconds))
	history = system.tag.queryTagHistory(paths=[pathTempZone,pathFlowDischarge],startDate=startTime,endDate=endTime,aggregationMode='LastValue',returnSize=300,noInterpolation=0)
	
	data = []
	for x in range(0,history.getRowCount()):
		data.append({'time':system.date.toMillis(history.getValueAt(x,0)),'zoneTemp':history.getValueAt(x,1),'flowDischarge':history.getValueAt(x,2)})
	
	return data

props.text: Max query range for demo: 2 weeks
